Posts.Content: herekitty024 wrote: Does anybody have any idea why after 11 treatments of TAXOL,my fingers are not only enduring the neuropathy but now feel as though they will pop and yellow to clear looking puss is running from them??So gross but wut to do and expect next?? Kathy Dx 3/12/2010, Paget's, Stage II, 5/17 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: PUSS COMING FROM FINGERNAILS herekitty024 herekitty024

Posts.Content: herekitty024 wrote: Update: Well everyone after 5 months off of Taxol/Herceptin for 11 weeks, my nails are slowing trying to grow back. its such slow process. Im still having some neuropathy that comes and goes still. Now I have started Herceptin again once every 3 weeks. Today when i went to get my 5th dose for the year 2011Â i was told that my echocardiogram showed my ejection fraction is 45% and referred to a cardiologist before i can continue my herceptin. Is this bad? Anyone ever had this happen and will i have to permanently stop Herceptin? Any comments is appreciated Kathy Dx 3/12/2010, Paget's, Stage II, 5/17 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Herceptin side effect: reduced Ejection Fraction herekitty024 marjie
